sorry, just saw this; yes, that was the idea here: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6948

author: etan_status
content:
https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6493#ssz-transaction-schema
> When representing such a transaction as part of the execution block header’s txs-root Merkle-Patricia Trie, this unique transaction identifier is embedded instead of the transaction’s raw network representation.
